node.name: Executive Summary
node.rich_text: Description of the purpose of the test and definitions of any terms that may be unfamiliar to executives, such as vulnerability and countermeasure. -
Overview of the effectiveness of the test, the issues found, and a general issues that cause vulnerabilities, such as a lack of patch management. -
overall rank of the organizations security posture compared to similar organizations whit measures such as high, moderate or low. Include an explanation of the ranking. -
Synopsis of te issues identified along whit statiscs and metrics on the effectiveness of any contermeasures deployed. -
a high-level overview of the tasks required to remediate the issues discovered in the pentest. -
: Short and long term goals to improve their security posture.
